â‘ ã€sort();ã€å…·æœ‰å’Œå¿«æ’ä¸€æ ·çš„é€Ÿåº¦ã€‘

å†™ä¸€ä¸ªcmpå‡½æ•° å®ç°ä»å¤§åˆ°å°æ’åº

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int cmp(int a, int b)
{
  return a > b; 
  //èš‚èšæ„Ÿå†’çš„æ­£è´Ÿæ•°ç»å¯¹å€¼ return abs(a) < abs(b); 
}
int main () {
    int a[5] = {4,2,1,3,5};
    vector<int> b(a,a+5);
    sort(a,a+5);//æ­é…æ•°ç»„  ä»å°åˆ°å¤§æ’åº
    sort(b.begin(),b.end());//æ­é…å®¹å™¨     //ä»å°åˆ°å¤§
    for (int i = 0; i < 5; i ++) {
        cout << a[i] << " ";
    }
    cout << endl;

    for (auto x:b) {
        cout << x << " " ;
    }

    cout << endl;
    sort(b.begin(),b.end(),cmp); //ä»å¤§åˆ°å°
    for (auto x:b) {
        cout << x << " ";
    }
    return 0;
}

#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int n,m;
int main()
{
    scanf("%d %d",&n,&m);
    int k=__gcd(n,m);//æœ€å¤§å…¬çº¦æ•°
    printf("%d ",k);
    printf("%d", n * m / k); //æœ€å°å…¬å€æ•°
    return 0;
}
